sys_atf_schedule.description:
This schedule will perform the following actions:
Run suite 'My demo test suites' on a system with this configuration: Firefox browser whose version starts with 56 Mac OS X operating system whose version starts with 10
Run suite 'My demo test suites' on a system with this configuration: Chrome browser on any version Mac OS X operating system on any version
sys_atf_schedule.name: Demo Schedule
